# [device_model] - IPV6-routing-commands generated by EXN-Code-Geni-v.0.1 #
###########################################################################

Device : C5 [device_ip]
Purpose: IPv6 Routing 

>set ipv6 enable
>router
>enable
>configure
>ipv6 unicast-routing
>interface vlan [ipv6_vlan]
>ipv6 address [ipv6_address]
>exit
>ipv6 route [ipv6_network] [ipv6_next_hop]
